name: Dive tactics
description:
A turn based exploration game made during the Black&White game jam n°11.

- Command a squad of submarines through a network of caves and mines in a desperate attempt to rescue your former coworkers.

- 8 weapons and tools at your disposal to fend off the wildlife.

- Everything is pretty dark down there. Use your trusty sonar and flares to navigate and remember : the right way is always downward.

Credits :

Art, programing, GD : Elie Vigouroux
Sound effects : Stormwave audio
Made with Gamemaker Studio 2
